overview:
Executive Vice President responsible for our CPG Business unit, Product Development, Marketing, and Business Development for MyWebGrocer. His team also manages Advertising Sales, Marketing Services, Mobile, and Ad Operations.

MyWebGrocer serves 100+ Retailers who do more than $200 Billion dollars in grocery sales. Putting them second only to WalMart in terms of reach and impact for CPG Partners such as Kellogg’s, Unilever, General Mill’s, Nestle, and P&G.

Alec is an Internet veteran with experience including MTV Networks, Lycos, and two Internet start ups. Alec was the Director of Search & Navigation at Lycos where he led the team that managed the Home Page of Lycos, Search, and Directories that represented 80% of Lycos.com traffic. He has more than 10 years of sales and product marketing experience with companies such as Bosch, LexiQuest, and MTV Networks.
